remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您可以将相关联与对象。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with a object. 类是用于检查绑定源属性在更新期间引发的异常的内置规则。The class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property. 可以提供自定义逻辑来指定绑定引擎如何处理这些异常使用。You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 设置的可选语法显式是设置属性设置为`true`上你或对象。An alternative syntax to setting the explicitly is to set the property to `true` on your or object. 可以通过创建派生的类创建自定义规则。You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from . 有关详细信息和数据验证的详细的讨论，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 属性采用一系列对象。The property takes a collection of objects. 下面的示例使用作为绑定目标属性和`StartPrice`（整数） 作为绑定源属性。The following example uses as the binding target property and `StartPrice` (an integer) as the binding source property. 当用户输入不能转换为整数的值时，将引发异常，这将导致要使之无效的目标值。When the user enters a value that cannot be converted to an integer, an exception is thrown, which causes the to invalidate the target value. [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#DefaultValidation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/AddProductWindow.xaml#defaultvalidation)] 默认情况下，验证错误时,红色边框，会显示。By default, when there is a validation error, the appears with a red border. （可选） 可以编写自定义以指定你想要出现验证错误时通知用户。Optionally, you can write a custom to specify how you want to notify the user when there is a validation error. 关于数据验证的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
